Title: Hannibal
Writer: Thomas Harris (novel), David Mamet (screenplay), Steven Zaillian (screenplay)
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman, Ray Liotta
Plot: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.
Production: DeLaurentiis Productions, Universal Pictures, Scott Free Productions, Metro Goldwyn Mayer
